opportunity.title: Analytics: Namada metrics dashboard
opportunity.shortDescription:
This is being worked on: https://forum.namada.net/t/introducing-a-new-namada-metrics-dashboard/1619 
As Phase 4 approaches, we need to know key metrics about what's happening in Namada, such as tokens deposited in the MASP and the rate of rewards they are earning. Next we would like to explore the metrics that help evaluate privacy strength.
